data.text:
@CBCOttawa Wait what? CBC is worried about Canadians being divided?! 
For taking off masks😞
@CBCOttawa What's so dividing about seeing people's faces and smiles? The most atomizing and dividing thing is keeping face diapers on.
@Ferg54482343 @CBCOttawa @fordnation The rest of the world is lifting restrictions and masking.  It's not some grand conspiracy to appease anyone.
@CBCOttawa No.  99.9% of Canadians don't care if you wear a mask or not.
@Ferg54482343 @CBCOttawa @fordnation One could say you keeping your mask on and mask policy at your business is virtue signaling and panders to the anti-freedom crowd.
@CBCOttawa Intelligent people understand the #pandemic is not over until #WHO says it's over - i will continue to wear my #Mask

@CBCOttawa The choice to mask or unmask is going to be a personal choice like wearing a hat, only a fool would make a issue of it as there are many reasons why someone would use a mask. Most Canadians recognize that.
@CBCOttawa Another positive story promoting Canadian unity. Hacks.
@CBCOttawa The @cbc is dividing Canadians. Would you shut up and find something useful to do . Useless fake news media
